title: Breathtaking views and incredible amenities! 1 bed 1 bath 802 sqft
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments', 'RENT:', '$1740 / MONTH', 'SIZE:', '802 sq ft', 'BEDROOMS:', '1', 'BATHROOMS:', '1', 'LEASE TERMS:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'show contact info', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '◾ 9 Foot Ceilings', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Garbage Disposal', '◾ Granite Islands In Kitchen', '◾ Oversized Windows', '◾ Plank Flooring', '◾ Sliding Glass Doors', '◾ Sprinkler System', '◾ Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '◾ Storage Space', 'At The Covington we offer studio, one and two bedroom apartments that are bright, open, and modern.', 'Each of our units has grand nine-foot ceilings, beautiful plank flooring, private balconies, and oversized windows that capture the surrounding views.', "You're sure to enjoy the community amenities that make our property stand out from the crowd.", 'Our rooftop patio has a convenient grilling station and a luxurious pool where you can relax and unwind.', 'Reserve and enjoy our theater room or bocce court for a memorable Friday night with friends, or work out in our first-rate fitness center to stay in shape.', 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '◾ Bike Storage', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Conference Room', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Guest Apartment', '◾ Online Payments', '◾ Pond', '◾ Recycling', '◾ Rooftop Lounge', '◾ Sundeck', '◾ 24-Hour Fitness Center', '◾ Barbecue/Grill Area', '◾ Fitness Programs/Classes', '◾ Furnished Units Available', '◾ Package Receiving', '◾ Pet Washing Station', '◾ Planned Social Activities', '◾ Video Surveillance/Patrol', '◾ Wake Up With Weidner Continental Breakfast', '◾ Welcoming Lobby Areas', 'PET POLICY:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'VISIT OR CALL US TODAY!', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'ECCFC0ABC7644589']
